glsa.title: irssi: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in irssi, the worst of which could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: irssi is a modular textUI IRC client with IPv6 support.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in irssi. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All irssi users should upgrade to the latest version:
